attributes.action: hold a public referendum into the re-establishment of the death penalty for crimes that involve the abuse and murder of children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the horrific abuse in the recent case of Baby P, we petition the Prime Minister to allow a public referendum on whether Capital Punishment should be re-instated for crimes where children and abused, neglected and/or murdered. Sadly, the case of Baby P is not unique and this happens in our country too often. We need to start thinking about tougher punishments that would act as a deterrent and help protect the children of Britain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
